Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.
Generation IX.Violet: Thanks to a behavior of theirs known as “synchronizing,” an entire flock of these Pokémon can attack simultaneously in perfect harmony.

Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Four , Area Five South Province: Area Five ( Bug Tera Type ) East Province: Area Two , Area Three West Province: Area Two , Area Three North Province: Area One , Casseroya Lake , Glaseado Mountain Area Zero Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
